channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Amazon Einzeltitellinks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Amazon Einzeltitellinks

item.title: CVE-2022-1830|2024-08-03T00:17:00.377Z -- unknown -- amazon%20einzeltitellinks
item.description: The Amazon Einzeltitellinks WordPress plugin through 1.3.3 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack and lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping
